Description: Unemployed and newly-divorced Stephanie Plum lands a job at her cousin's bail-bond business, where her first assignment puts her on the trail of a wanted local cop from her romantic past.

Title: Police Academy 3: Back in Training
Description: The alumni of Commandant Lassard's Police Academy (1984) return to the school to train new recruits and prevent its closure.

Title: Say When
Description: In the throes of a quarter-life crisis, Megan panics when her boyfriend proposes, then, taking an opportunity to escape for a week, hides out in the home of her new friend, 16-year-old Annika, who lives with her world-weary single dad.

Title: Le samouraï
Description: After professional hitman Jef Costello is seen by witnesses his efforts to provide himself an alibi drive him further into a corner.

Title: True Grit
Description: A drunken, hard-nosed U.S. Marshal and a Texas Ranger help a stubborn teenager track down her father's murderer in Indian territory.

Title: Udaan
Description: Expelled from his school, a 16-year old boy returns home to his abusive and oppressive father.

Title: Better Off Dead...
Description: A teenager has to deal with his girlfriend dumping him among family crises, homicidal paper boys, and a rival skier.

Title: The Equalizer 2
Description: Robert McCall serves an unflinching justice for the exploited and oppressed, but how far will he go when that is someone he loves?

Title: Only the Brave
Description: Based on the true story of the Granite Mountain Hotshots, a group of elite firefighters who risk everything to protect a town from a historic wildfire.

Title: Monte Carlo
Description: Three young women vacationing in Paris find themselves whisked away to Monte Carlo after one of the girls is mistaken for a British heiress.

Title: Prime
Description: A career driven professional from Manhattan is wooed by a young painter, who also happens to be the son of her psychoanalyst.

Title: Maggie
Description: A teenage girl in the Midwest becomes infected by an outbreak of a disease that slowly turns the infected into cannibalistic zombies. During her transformation, her loving father stays by her side.

Title: Cowboy Bebop: The Movie
Description: A terrorist explosion releases a deadly virus on the masses, and it's up the bounty-hunting Bebop crew to catch the cold-blooded culprit.

Title: Rob Roy
Description: In 1713 Scotland, Rob Roy MacGregor is wronged by a nobleman and his nephew, becomes an outlaw in search of revenge while fleeing the Redcoats, and faces charges of being a Jacobite.

Title: Forushande
Description: While both participating in a production of "Death of a Salesman," a teacher's wife is assaulted in her new home, which leaves him determined to find the perpetrator over his wife's traumatized objections.

Title: Fan
Description: Gaurav's world revolves around the superstar Aryan Khanna. What happens when his passion turns into a dangerous obsession that crosses the fine line?

Title: The Kid
Description: An unhappy and disliked image consultant gets a second shot at life when he is mysteriously confronted by an eight-year-old version of himself.

Title: Diary of a Wimpy Kid
Description: The adventures of a 12 year old who is fresh out of elementary and transitions to middle school, where he has to learn the consequences and responsibility to survive the year.

Title: Guess Who
Description: A young woman, Theresa, brings her boyfriend, Simon, home to meet her parents and surprise them with the news of their engagement. Another surprise: Simon is white.

Title: The Space Between Us
Description: The first human born on Mars travels to Earth for the first time, experiencing the wonders of the planet through fresh eyes. He embarks on an adventure with a street smart girl to discover how he came to be.

Title: Anonymous
Description: The theory that it was in fact Edward De Vere, Earl of Oxford, who penned Shakespeare's plays. Set against the backdrop of the succession of Queen Elizabeth I and the Essex rebellion against her.

Title: The River Wild
Description: Rafting expert Gail takes on a pair of armed killers while navigating a spectacularly violent river.

Title: Casualties of War
Description: During the Vietnam War, a soldier finds himself the outsider of his own squad when they unnecessarily kidnap a female villager.

Title: On the Road
Description: Young writer Sal Paradise has his life shaken by the arrival of free-spirited Dean Moriarty and his girl, Marylou. As they travel across the country, they encounter a mix of people who each impact their journey indelibly.

Title: The Damned United
Description: The story of the controversial Brian Clough's 44-day reign as the coach of the English football club Leeds United.

Title: God's Not Dead
Description: College philosophy professor Mr. Radisson's curriculum is challenged by his new student, Josh, who believes God exists.

Title: The First Wives Club
Description: Reunited by the death of a college friend, three divorced women seek revenge on the husbands who left them for younger women.

Title: Ginger Snaps
Description: Two death-obsessed sisters, outcasts in their suburban neighborhood, must deal with the tragic consequences when one of them is bitten by a deadly werewolf.

Title: Happy Feet Two
Description: Mumble's son, Erik, is struggling to realize his talents in the Emperor Penguin world. Meanwhile, Mumble and his family and friends discover a new threat their home -- one that will take everyone working together to save them.

Title: Paddington 2
Description: Paddington, now happily settled with the Brown family and a popular member of the local community, picks up a series of odd jobs to buy the perfect present for his Aunt Lucy's 100th birthday, only for the gift to be stolen.

Title: Pot Luck
Description: A strait-laced French student moves into an apartment in Barcelona with a cast of six other characters from all over Europe. Together, they speak the international language of love and friendship.

Title: The Nights of Cabiria
Description: A waifish prostitute wanders the streets of Rome looking for true love but finds only heartbreak.

Title: Shadow of the Vampire
Description: The filming of Nosferatu (1922) is hampered by the fact that its star Max Schreck is taking the role of a vampire far more seriously than seems humanly possible.

Title: Vozvrashchenie
Description: In the Russian wilderness, two brothers face a range of new, conflicting emotions when their father - a man they know only through a single photograph - resurfaces.

Title: Notorious
Description: The life and death story of Notorious B.I.G. (a.k.a. Christopher Wallace), who came straight out of Brooklyn to take the world of rap music by storm.

Title: Striking Distance
Description: Coming from a police family, Tom Hardy ends up fighting his uncle after the murder of his father. Tom believes the killer is another cop and goes on the record with his allegations. Demoted then to river duty, the killer taunts Tom.

Title: Byzantium
Description: Residents of a coastal town learn, with deathly consequences, the secret shared by the two mysterious women who have sought shelter at a local resort.

Title: Black Sheep
Description: An experiment in genetic engineering turns harmless sheep into bloodthirsty killers that terrorize a sprawling New Zealand farm.

Title: The Boss
Description: A titan of industry is sent to prison after she's caught insider trading. When she emerges ready to rebrand herself as America's latest sweetheart, not everyone she screwed over is so quick to forgive and forget.

Title: Halloween 4: The Return of Michael Myers
Description: Ten years after his original massacre, the invalid Michael Myers awakens on Halloween Eve and returns to Haddonfield to kill his seven-year-old niece. Can Dr. Loomis stop him?

Title: Friday the 13th: The Final Chapter
Description: After being mortally wounded and taken to the morgue, murderer Jason Voorhees spontaneously revives and embarks on a killing spree as he makes his way back to his home at Camp Crystal Lake.

Title: Whale Rider
Description: A contemporary story of love, rejection and triumph as a young Maori girl fights to fulfill a destiny her grandfather refuses to recognize.

Title: The Haunted Mansion
Description: A realtor and his wife and children are summoned to a mansion, which they soon discover is haunted, and while they attempt to escape, he learns an important lesson about the family he has neglected.

Title: Taxi
Description: A mouthy and feisty taxicab driver has hot tips for a green and inept cop set on solving a string of New York City bank robberies committed by a quartet of female Brazilian bank robbers.

Title: Saul fia
Description: In the horror of 1944 Auschwitz, a prisoner forced to burn the corpses of his own people finds moral survival upon trying to salvage from the flames the body of a boy he takes for his son.

Title: Driven
Description: A young hot shot driver is in the middle of a championship season and is coming apart at the seams. A former CART champion is called in to give him guidance.

Title: Endless Love
Description: The story of a privileged girl and a charismatic boy whose instant desire sparks a love affair made only more reckless by parents trying to keep them apart.

Title: The Enforcer
Description: Dirty Harry must foil a terrorist organization made up of disgruntled Vietnam veterans. But this time, he's teamed with a rookie female partner that he's not too excited to be working with.

Title: The Poseidon Adventure
Description: Nine people explore a cruise ship at sea in a manner that turns their whole lives upside down.

Title: Death to Smoochy
Description: A kids show host, Rainbow Randolph, is fired in disgrace while his replacement, Sheldon Mopes, aka Smoochy the Rhino, finds himself a rising star. Unfortunately for Sheldon, the business of kids television isn't all child's play.

Title: Clash of the Titans
Description: Perseus must battle both Medusa and the Kraken to save the Princess Andromeda.

Title: Down with Love
Description: In 1962 New York City, love blossoms between a playboy journalist and a feminist advice author.

Title: Batman: Mask of the Phantasm
Description: Batman is wrongly implicated in a series of murders of mob bosses actually done by a new vigilante assassin.

Title: Big Momma's House 2
Description: An FBI agent reprises his disguise as a corpulent old lady and takes a job as a nanny in a crime suspect's house.

Title: Brick Mansions
Description: An undercover Detroit cop navigates a dangerous neighborhood that's surrounded by a containment wall with the help of an ex-con in order to bring down a crime lord and his plot to devastate the entire city.

Title: All About Steve
Description: Convinced that a CCN cameraman is her true love, an eccentric crossword puzzler trails him as he travels all over the country, hoping to convince him that they belong together.

Title: Idle Hands
Description: A teenage slacker's right hand becomes possessed with murderous intent.

Title: Roxanne
Description: The large-nosed C.D. Bales is in love with the beautiful Roxanne; she falls for his personality but another man's looks.

Title: Three Burials
Description: Ranch hand Pete Perkins looks to fulfill the promise to his recently deceased best friend by burying him in his hometown in Mexico.

Title: The Last Picture Show
Description: In 1951, a group of high schoolers come of age in a bleak, isolated, atrophied West Texas town that is slowly dying, both culturally and economically.

Title: Halloween III: Season of the Witch
Description: Kids all over America want Silver Shamrock masks for Halloween. Doctor Daniel Challis seeks to uncover a plot by Silver Shamrock owner Conal Cochran.

Title: Bakjwi
Description: Through a failed medical experiment, a priest is stricken with vampirism and is forced to abandon his ascetic ways.

Title: Andrei Rublev
Description: The life, times and afflictions of the fifteenth-century Russian iconographer.

Title: Slow West
Description: A young Scottish man travels across America in pursuit of the woman he loves, attracting the attention of an outlaw who is willing to serve as a guide.

Title: Honey I Blew Up the Kid
Description: The Szalinski family is back, this time hilarious disaster strikes when an experiment causes their new toddler son to grow many stories tall.

Title: Narc
Description: When the trail goes cold on a murder investigation of a policeman an undercover narcotics officer is lured back to the force to help solve the case.

Title: The Joneses
Description: A seemingly perfect family moves into a suburban neighborhood, but when it comes to the truth as to why they're living there, they don't exactly come clean with their neighbors.

Title: North Country
Description: A fictionalized account of the first major successful sexual harassment case in the United States, Jenson vs. Eveleth Mines, where a woman who endured a range of abuse while working as a miner filed and won the landmark 1984 lawsuit.

Title: Taxi 3
Description: Out to stop a new gang disguised as Santa Claus, Emilien and Daniel must also handle major changes in their personal relationships.

Title: Tooth Fairy
Description: A bad deed on the part of a tough minor-league hockey player results in an unusual sentence: He must serve one week as a real-life tooth fairy.

Title: Zelig
Description: "Documentary" about a man who can look and act like whoever he's around, and meets various famous people.

Title: Crossroads
Description: Three childhood best friends, and a guy they just met, take a road trip across the country, finding themselves and their friendship in the process.

Title: The Predator
Description: When a young boy accidentally triggers the universe's most lethal hunters' return to Earth, only a ragtag crew of ex-soldiers and a disgruntled scientist can prevent the end of the human race.

Title: Ju-on
Description: A mysterious and vengeful spirit marks and pursues anybody who dares enter the house in which it resides.

Title: Freddy's Dead: The Final Nightmare
Description: Dream-haunting Freddy Krueger returns once again to prowl the nightmares of Springwood's last surviving teenager, and of a woman whose personal connection to Krueger may mean his doom.

Title: Yip Man 3
Description: When a band of brutal gangsters led by a crooked property developer make a play to take over a local school, Master Ip is forced to take a stand.

Title: Paranormal Activity: The Marked Ones
Description: When a young man becomes the target of a malevolent entity, he must uncover its true intentions before it takes complete control of him.

Title: Fifty Shades Freed
Description: Anastasia and Christian get married, but Jack Hyde continues to threaten their relationship.

Title: Of Mice and Men
Description: Two drifters, one a gentle but slow giant, try to make money working the fields during the Depression so they can fulfill their dreams.

Title: Detroit
Description: Fact-based drama set during the 1967 Detroit riots in which a group of rogue police officers respond to a complaint with retribution rather than justice on their minds.

Title: Hustle & Flow
Description: With help from his friends, a Memphis pimp in a mid-life crisis attempts to become a successful hip-hop emcee.

Title: Saving Silverman
Description: A pair of buddies conspire to save their best friend from marrying the wrong woman.

Title: Ben-Hur
Description: Judah Ben-Hur, a prince falsely accused of treason by his adopted brother, an officer in the Roman army, returns to his homeland after years at sea to seek revenge, but finds redemption.

Title: Creepshow
Description: An anthology which tells five terrifying tales based on the E.C. horror comic books of the 1950s.

Title: Fear
Description: When Nicole met David; handsome, charming, affectionate, he was everything. It seemed perfect, but soon she sees that David has a darker side. And his adoration turns to obsession, their dream into a nightmare, and her love into fear.

Title: Hellbound: Hellraiser II
Description: Kirsty is brought to an institution after the death of her family, where the occult-obsessive head resurrects Julia and unleashes the Cenobites once again.

Title: The Messengers
Description: An ominous darkness invades a seemingly serene sunflower farm in North Dakota, and the Solomon family is torn apart by suspicion, mayhem and murder.

Title: Police Academy 4: Citizens on Patrol
Description: The misfit Police Academy (1984) graduates now are assigned to train a group of civilian volunteers to fight crime once again plaguing the streets.

Title: The Horse Whisperer
Description: The mother of a severely traumatized daughter enlists the aid of a unique horse trainer to help the girl's equally injured horse.

Title: The Skeleton Twins
Description: Having both coincidentally cheated death on the same day, estranged twins reunite with the possibility of mending their relationship.

Title: Piranha 3DD
Description: After the events at Lake Victoria, the pre-historic school of blood-thirsty piranhas make their way into a newly opened waterpark.

Title: Toni Erdmann
Description: A practical joking father tries to reconnect with his hard working daughter by creating an outrageous alter ego and posing as her CEO's life coach.

Title: Nick of Time
Description: An unimpressive, every-day man is forced into a situation where he is told to kill a politician to save his kidnapped daughter.

Title: Hævnen
Description: The lives of two Danish families cross each other, and an extraordinary but risky friendship comes into bud. But loneliness, frailty and sorrow lie in wait.

Title: Buffy the Vampire Slayer
Description: A flighty teenage girl learns that she is her generation's destined battler of vampires.

Title: Sudden Impact
Description: A rape victim is exacting revenge on her aggressors in a small town outside San Francisco. "Dirty" Harry Callahan, on suspension for angering his superiors (again), is assigned to the case.

Title: Paper Moon
Description: During the Great Depression, a con man finds himself saddled with a young girl who may or may not be his daughter, and the two forge an unlikely partnership.

Title: Hannah Montana: The Movie
Description: As Hannah Montana's popularity begins to take over her life, Miley Stewart, on the urging from her father takes a trip to her hometown of Crowley Corners, Tennessee to get some perspective on what matters in life the most.

Title: Camp X-Ray
Description: A soldier assigned to Guantanamo Bay befriends a man who has been imprisoned there.

Title: Alexander and the Terrible, Horrible, No Good, Very Bad Day
Description: Alexander's day begins with gum stuck in his hair, followed by more calamities. However, he finds little sympathy from his family and begins to wonder if bad things only happen to him, his mom, dad, brother and sister - who all find themselves living through their own terrible, horrible, no good, very bad day.

Title: Deadfall
Description: A thriller that follows two siblings who decide to fend for themselves in the wake of a botched casino heist, and their unlikely reunion during another family's Thanksgiving celebration.

Title: Darbareye Elly
Description: The mysterious disappearance of a kindergarten teacher during a picnic in the north of Iran is followed by a series of misadventures for her fellow travelers.

Title: Jaws: The Revenge
Description: Chief Brody's widow believes that her family is deliberately being targeted by another shark in search of revenge.

Title: Anthropoid
Description: Based on the extraordinary true story of Operation Anthropoid, the WWII mission to assassinate SS General Reinhard Heydrich, the main architect behind the Final Solution and the Reich's third in command after Hitler and Himmler.

Title: Tigerland

Title: JCVD
Description: Jean-Claude Van Damme gets involved in a bank robbery with hostages situation and reflects about his life during it.

Title: Insidious: The Last Key
Description: Parapsychologist Dr. Elise Rainier faces her most fearsome and personal haunting yet, as she is drawn back to her ghostly childhood home, where the terror began.

Title: Deception

Title: Fred Claus

Title: Rough Night

Title: Spread
Description: A sex comedy centered on a serial womanizer and his jilted lover.

Title: Bird on a Wire
Description: An old flame discovers her ex-boyfriend from the past is a relocated FBI informant out to stop the bad guys.

Title: The Lazarus Effect
Description: A group of medical researchers discover a way to bring dead patients back to life.

Title: License to Wed
Description: A reverend puts an engaged couple through a grueling marriage preparation course to see if they are meant to be married in his church.

Title: The Dead Pool
Description: Dirty Harry Callahan must stop a sick secret contest to murder local celebrities, which includes himself as a target.

Title: 47 Metres Down
Description: Two sisters vacationing in Mexico are trapped in a shark cage at the bottom of the ocean. With less than an hour of oxygen left and great white sharks circling nearby, they must fight to survive.

Title: The Spy Next Door

Title: Bienvenue chez les Ch'tis

Title: Before I Fall
Description: February 12 is just another day in Sam's charmed life, until it turns out to be her last. Stuck reliving her last day over and over, Sam untangles the mystery around her death and discovers everything she's losing.

Description: A look at a few chapters in the life of Poppy, a cheery, colorful, North London schoolteacher whose optimism tends to exasperate those around her.

Title: Boy A
Description: The story of a young Jack, newly released from serving a prison sentence for a violent crime he committed as a child.

Title: Blow Out
Description: A movie sound recordist accidentally records the evidence that proves that a car accident was actually murder and consequently finds himself in danger.

Title: Madeo
Description: A mother desperately searches for the killer who framed her son for a girl's horrific murder.

Title: Les Misérables
Description: Valjean, a former criminal, has atoned for his past and now finds himself in the midst of the French Revolution, avoiding a law-obsessed policeman hell-bent on capturing him.

Title: Annie
Description: A young orphan girl's adventures in finding a family that will take her.

Title: A Nightmare on Elm Street: The Dream Child
Description: The pregnant Alice finds Freddy Krueger striking through the sleeping mind of her unborn child, hoping to be reborn into the real world.

Title: Withnail & I
Description: In 1969, two substance-abusing, unemployed actors retreat to the countryside for a holiday that proves disastrous.

Title: The Broken Circle Breakdown
Description: Elise and Didier fall in love at first sight, in spite of their differences. He talks, she listens. He's a romantic atheist, she's a religious realist. When their daughter becomes seriously ill, their love is put on trial.

Title: Sophie's Choice
Description: Sophie is the survivor of Nazi concentration camps, who has found a reason to live with Nathan, a sparkling if unsteady American Jew obsessed with the Holocaust. They befriend Stingo, the ...                See full summary »

Title: A Thousand Words
Description: After stretching the truth on a deal with a spiritual guru, literary agent Jack McCall finds a Bodhi tree on his property. Its appearance holds a valuable lesson on the consequences of every word he speaks.

Title: Balto
Description: An outcast half-wolf risks his life to prevent a deadly epidemic from ravaging Nome, Alaska.

Title: The Fifth Estate
Description: A dramatic thriller based on real events that reveals the quest to expose the deceptions and corruptions of power that turned an Internet upstart into the 21st century's most fiercely debated organization.

Title: The Curse of the Jade Scorpion
Description: An insurance investigator and an efficency expert who hate each other are both hypnotized by a crooked hypnotist with a jade scorpion into stealing jewels.

Title: Radio
Description: The story of a high school coach and the developmentally challenged man who he took under his wing.

Title: Stop! Or My Mom Will Shoot
Description: A tough police sergeant's overbearing mother comes to visit him and begins to meddle in his life and career.

Title: Because I Said So
Description: A meddling mother tries to set her daughter up with the right man so her kid won't follow in her footsteps.

Title: The Prince & Me
Description: At college Paige meets Eddie, a fellow student from Denmark, whom she first dislikes but later accepts, likes, and loves; he proves to be Crown Prince Edvard. Paige follows him to Copenhagen, and he follows her back to school with a plan.

Title: Mighty Aphrodite
Description: When he discovers his adopted son is a genius, a New York sportswriter seeks out the boy's birth mother: a ditzy porn star and prostitute.

Title: Asterix and Obelix Take on Caesar
Description: The well-known little village from the Asterix and Obelix-comic books is in trouble: It is the last place not controlled by Rome. When Tax collector Claudius Incorruptus does not get his ...                See full summary »

Title: Lovelace
Description: The story of Linda Lovelace, who is used and abused by the porn industry at the behest of her coercive husband, before taking control of her life.

Title: Meet Dave
Description: A crew of miniature aliens operate a spaceship that has a human form. While trying to save their planet, the aliens encounter a new problem, as their ship becomes smitten with an Earth woman.

Title: Brotherhood
Description: When two brothers are forced to fight in the Korean War, the elder decides to take the riskiest missions if it will help shield the younger from battle.

Title: Secret in Their Eyes
Description: A tight-knit team of rising investigators, along with their supervisor, is suddenly torn apart when they discover that one of their own teenage daughters has been brutally murdered.

Title: The Forest
Description: A woman goes into Japan's Suicide Forest to find her twin sister, and confronts supernatural terror.

Title: The Transporter Refueled
Description: In the south of France, former special-ops mercenary Frank Martin enters into a game of chess with a femme-fatale and her three sidekicks who are looking for revenge against a sinister Russian kingpin.

Title: Heartbreak Ridge
Description: A hard-nosed, hard-living Marine gunnery sergeant clashes with his superiors and his ex-wife as he takes command of a spoiled recon platoon with a bad attitude.

Title: Night of the Living Dead
Description: The unburied dead return to life and seek human victims.

Title: Raees
Description: A bootlegger sets out to improve his community as a promising leader but falls in a political trap.

Title: The Medallion
Description: A Hong Kong detective suffers a fatal accident involving a mysterious medallion and is transformed into an immortal warrior with superhuman powers.

Title: Miracle on 34th Street
Description: When a nice old man who claims to be Santa Claus is institutionalized as insane, a young lawyer decides to defend him by arguing in court that he is the real thing.

Title: Enough

Title: World's Greatest Dad
Description: When his son's body is found in a humiliating accident, a lonely high school teacher inadvertently attracts an overwhelming amount of community and media attention after covering up the truth with a phony suicide note.

Description: Harry Caine, a blind writer, reaches this moment in time when he has to heal his wounds from 14 years back. He was then still known by his real name, Mateo Blanco, and directing his last movie.

Title: Talaash
Description: Inspector Surjan Shekhawat, who is dealing with a depressing past, has to investigate a high profile murder case, deal with his crumbling marriage and use the help and solace of a prostitute by the name of Rosie.

Title: Blair Witch

Title: In the Bedroom
Description: A New England couple's college-aged son dates an older woman who has two small children and an unwelcome ex-husband.

Title: The Transformers: The Movie
Description: The Autobots must stop a colossal planet consuming robot who goes after the Autobot Matrix of Leadership. At the same time, they must defend themselves against an all-out attack from the Decepticons.

Title: Whiteout
Description: U.S. Marshal Carrie Stetko tracks a killer in Antarctica, as the sun is about to set for six months.

Title: En man som heter Ove
Description: Ove, an ill-tempered, isolated retiree who spends his days enforcing block association rules and visiting his wife's grave, has finally given up on life just as an unlikely friendship develops with his boisterous new neighbors.

Title: Romper Stomper
Description: A group of skinheads become alarmed at the way their neighbourhood is changing.

Title: The Water Horse
Description: A lonely boy discovers a mysterious egg that hatches a sea creature of Scottish legend.

Title: A Room with a View
Description: When Lucy Honeychurch and chaperone Charlotte Bartlett find themselves in Florence with rooms without views, fellow guests Mr Emerson and son George step in to remedy the situation. Meeting...                See full summary »

Title: The Rocker
Description: The Rocker tells the story of a failed drummer who is given a second chance at fame. Robert "Fish" Fishman is the extremely dedicated and astoundingly passionate drummer for the eighties ...                See full summary »

Title: The Hottie & the Nottie
Description: A woman agrees to go on a date with a man only if he finds a suitor for her unattractive best friend.

Title: The Gunman
Description: A sniper on a mercenary assassination team, kills the minister of mines of the Congo. Terrier's successful kill shot forces him into hiding. Returning to the Congo years later, he becomes the target of a hit squad himself.

Title: The Double Life of Véronique
Description: Two parallel stories about two identical women; one living in Poland, the other in France. They don't know each other, but their lives are nevertheless profoundly connected.

Title: Ra.One
Description: A computer game character takes on physical form to destroy a player who nearly beat him but quit the game in between.

Title: Dead Ringers

Title: Red Sonja
Description: A female Redhead sets out on a killing spree to avenge her family's murder.

Title: Aquamarine
Description: Two teenage girls discover a mermaid in their beach club's swimming pool.

Description: Mel Brooks' parody of the classic vampire story and its famous film adaptations.

Title: Black Knight
Description: Martin Lawrence plays Jamal, an employee in Medieval World amusement park. After sustaining a blow to the head, he awakens to find himself in 14th century England.

Title: Southland Tales
Description: During a three day heat wave just before a huge 4th of July celebration, an action star stricken with amnesia meets up with a porn star who is developing her own reality TV project, and a policeman who holds the key to a vast conspiracy.

Title: Beverly Hills Ninja
Description: A man tries to rescue a woman with a little help from his half brother.

Title: Hung fan kui

Description: A detective and a psychoanalyst uncover evidence of a satanic cult while investigating the rape of a young woman.

Title: Dnevnoy dozor
Description: A man who serves in the war between the forces of Light and Dark comes into possession of a device that can restore life to Moscow, which was nearly destroyed by an apocalyptic event.

Title: Central Station
Description: An emotive journey of a former school teacher, who writes letters for illiterate people, and a young boy, whose mother has just died, as they search for the father he never knew.

Title: Private Parts
Description: The autobiographical story of Howard Stern, the radio rebel who is now also a TV personality, an author and a movie star.

Title: Jason Lives: Friday the 13th Part VI
Description: Tommy Jarvis goes to the graveyard to get rid of Jason Voorhees' body once and for all, but inadvertently brings him back to life instead. The newly revived killer once again seeks revenge, and Tommy may be the only one who can defeat him.

Title: Emma
Description: While matchmaking for friends and neighbours, a young 19th Century Englishwoman nearly misses her own chance at love.

Title: St. Elmo's Fire
Description: A group of friends, just out of college, struggle with adulthood.

Title: The Salvation
Description: In 1870s America, the fury of a notorious gang leader is unleashed when a peaceful American settler avenges the death of his family. Then as his cowardly fellow townspeople betray him, he is forced to hunt down the outlaws alone.

Title: Kill Your Darlings
Description: A murder in 1944 draws together the great poets of the beat generation: Allen Ginsberg, Jack Kerouac and William Burroughs.

Title: Evita
Description: The hit musical based on the life of Evita Duarte, a B-picture Argentinian actress who eventually became the wife of Argentinian president Juan Perón, and the most beloved and hated woman in Argentina.

Title: Undercover Brother
Description: When "The Man" tries to derail a black candidate's presidential campaign, Undercover Brother and his fellow secret agents come to the rescue.

Title: Maniac
Description: As he helps a young artist with her upcoming exhibition, the owner of a mannequin shop's deadly, suppressed desires come to the surface.

Title: The Amityville Horror
Description: Newlyweds move into a large house where a mass murder was committed, and experience strange manifestations which drive them away.

Title: Kill List
Description: Nearly a year after a botched job, a hitman takes a new assignment with the promise of a big payoff for three killings. What starts off as an easy task soon unravels, sending the killer into the heart of darkness.

Title: Nurse Betty
Description: Comedy about a widow's post-traumatic obsession with a soap star.

Title: Left Behind
Description: A small group of survivors are left behind after millions of people suddenly vanish and the world is plunged into chaos and destruction.

Title: The Human Centipede II (Full Sequence)
Description: Inspired by the fictional Dr. Heiter, disturbed loner Martin dreams of creating a 12-person centipede and sets out to realize his sick fantasy.

Title: The Green Inferno
Description: A group of student activists travels to the Amazon to save the rain forest and soon discover that they are not alone, and that no good deed goes unpunished.

Title: Muriel's Wedding
Description: A young social outcast in Australia steals money from her parents to finance a vacation where she hopes to find happiness, and perhaps love.

Title: Slap Shot
Description: A failing ice hockey team finds success with outrageously violent hockey goonery.

Title: Admission
Description: A Princeton admissions officer who is up for a major promotion takes a professional risk after she meets a college-bound alternative school kid who just might be the son she gave up years ago in a secret adoption.

Title: Fantasia 2000
Description: An update of the original film with new interpretations of great works of classical music.

Title: Passengers
Description: A grief counselor working with a group of plane-crash survivors finds herself at the root of a mystery when her clients begin to disappear.

Title: Shaun the Sheep Movie
Description: When Shaun decides to take the day off and have some fun, he gets a little more action than he bargained for. A mix up with the Farmer, a caravan and a very steep hill lead them all to the Big City and it's up to Shaun and the flock to return everyone safely to the green grass of home.

Title: I Love You, Beth Cooper
Description: A nerdy valedictorian proclaims his love for the hottest and most popular girl in school - Beth Cooper - during his graduation speech. Much to his surprise, Beth shows up at his door that very night and decides to show him the best night of his life.

Title: The New Guy
Description: A high school senior branded uncool in the ninth grade gets himself expelled so he changes his image to cool kid at the town's other high school.

Title: All Dogs Go to Heaven
Description: In 1939, After escape from rest of peace of dogs, When Charlie Barkin went to heaven on afterlife to the universe.

Title: It Could Happen to You
Description: A police officer promises to share his lottery ticket with a waitress in lieu of a tip.

Title: Red Tails
Description: A crew of African American pilots in the Tuskegee training program, having faced segregation while kept mostly on the ground during World War II, are called into duty under the guidance of Col. A.J. Bullard.

Title: Joe Versus the Volcano
Description: When a hypochondriac learns that he is dying, he accepts an offer to throw himself in a volcano at a tropical island, and along the way there, learns to truly live.

Title: Shattered Glass
Description: The story of a young journalist who fell from grace when it was discovered he fabricated over half of his articles from the publication The New Republic magazine.

Title: Drumline
Description: A band director recruits a Harlem street drummer to play at a Southern university.

Title: The Illusionist
Description: A French illusionist finds himself out of work and travels to Scotland, where he meets a young woman. Their ensuing adventure changes both their lives forever.

Title: Hair
Description: Claude Bukowski leaves the family ranch in Oklahoma for New York where he is rapidly embraced into the hippie group of youngsters led by Berger, yet he's already been drafted. He soon falls in love with Sheila Franklin, a rich girl but still a rebel inside.

Title: The Killer Inside Me
Description: A West Texas Deputy Sheriff is slowly unmasked as a psychotic killer.

Title: The Verdict
Description: A lawyer sees the chance to salvage his career and self-respect by taking a medical malpractice case to trial rather than settling.

Title: Femme Fatale
Description: A woman tries to straighten out her life, even as her past as a con-woman comes back to haunt her.

Title: The 33
Description: Based on the real-life event, when a gold and copper mine collapses, it traps 33 miners underground for 69 days.

Title: Love & Mercy
Description: In the 1960s, Beach Boys leader Brian Wilson struggles with emerging psychosis as he attempts to craft his avant-garde pop masterpiece. In the 1980s, he is a broken, confused man under the 24-hour watch of shady therapist Dr. Eugene Landy.

Title: Hollywoodland
Description: A detective examines the mysterious death of George Reeves, the star of the television series Adventures of Superman (1952).

Title: Exorcist: The Beginning
Description: Years before Father Lankester Merrin helped save Regan MacNeil's soul, he first encounters the demon Pazuzu in East Africa. This is the tale of Father Merrin's initial battle with Pazuzu and the rediscovery of his faith.

Title: The Lawnmower Man
Description: A simple man is turned into a genius through the application of computer science.

Title: The Nines
Description: A troubled actor, a television show runner, and an acclaimed videogame designer find their lives intertwining in mysterious and unsettling ways.

Title: Cold in July
Description: When a protective father meets a murderous ex-con, both need to deviate from the path they are on as they soon find themselves entangled in a downwards spiral of lies and violence while having to confront their own inner psyche.

Title: Prom Night
Description: Donna's senior prom is supposed to be the best night of her life, though a sadistic killer from her past has different plans for her and her friends.

Title: Keeping Mum
Description: A pastor preoccupied with writing the perfect sermon fails to realize that his wife is having an affair, and his children are up to no good.

Title: Velvet Goldmine
Description: In 1984, British journalist Arthur Stuart investigates the career of 1970s glam superstar Brian Slade, who was heavily influenced in his early years by hard-living and rebellious American singer Curt Wild.

Title: No Way Out
Description: A coverup and witchhunt occur after a politician accidentally kills his mistress.

Title: Don
Description: A simple man, Vijay, is recruited by a police officer to masquerade as Don, the leader of an international gang of smugglers. But things go wrong when the officer is killed and Vijay is left to fend for himself.

Title: Nim's Island
Description: A young girl inhabits an isolated island with her scientist father and communicates with a reclusive author of the novel she's reading.

Title: The Cook, the Thief, His Wife & Her Lover
Description: The wife of an abusive criminal finds solace in the arms of a kind regular guest in her husband's restaurant.

Title: Bug
Description: An unhinged war veteran holes up with a lonely woman in a spooky Oklahoma motel room. The line between reality and delusion is blurred as they discover a bug infestation.

Title: We Are Your Friends
Description: Caught between a forbidden romance and the expectations of his friends, aspiring DJ Cole Carter attempts to find the path in life that leads to fame and fortune.

Title: Black Sea
Description: In order to make good with his former employers, a submarine captain takes a job with a shadowy backer to search the depths of the Black Sea for a submarine rumored to be loaded with gold.

Title: The Quiet Man
Description: A retired American boxer returns to the village of his birth in Ireland, where he finds love.

Title: Smoke
Description: A Brooklyn smoke shop is the center of neighborhood activity, and the stories of its customers.

Title: Prince of Darkness
Description: A research team finds a mysterious cylinder in a deserted church. If opened, it could mean the end of the world.

Title: Captain Corelli's Mandolin
Description: When a fisherman leaves to fight with the Greek army during World War II, his fiancée falls in love with the local Italian commander.

Title: Death Wish
Description: A New York City architect becomes a one-man vigilante squad after his wife is murdered by street punks in which he randomly goes out and kills would-be muggers on the mean streets after dark.

Title: Spice World
Description: World famous pop group the Spice Girls zip around London in their luxurious double decker tour bus having various adventures and performing for their fans.

Title: Igby Goes Down
Description: A young man's peculiar upbringing renders him unable to competently cope with the struggle of growing up.

Title: Mandariinid
Description: War in Georgia, Apkhazeti region in 1990. An Estonian man Ivo has stayed behind to harvest his crops of tangerines. In a bloody conflict at his door, a wounded man is left behind, and Ivo is forced to take him in.

Title: Find Me Guilty
Description: In the late 1980s, a low level gangster named Jackie DiNorscio defends himself in court in what became the longest criminal trial in American judicial history.

Title: Caligula
Description: Details the graphic and shocking, yet undeniably tragic story of Rome's most infamous Caesar, Gaius Germanicus Caligula.

Title: 102 Dalmatians
Description: Cruella DeVil gets out of prison and goes after the puppies once more.

Title: The Unbearable Lightness of Being
Description: In 1968, a Czech doctor with an active sex life meets a woman who wants monogamy, and then the Soviet invasion further disrupts their lives.

Title: So I Married an Axe Murderer
Description: A San Francisco poet who fears commitment suspects his girlfriend may have a knack for killing off her significant others.

Title: Heist
Description: A career jewel thief finds himself at tense odds with his longtime partner, a crime boss who sends his nephew to keep watch.

Title: Alex Cross
Description: A homicide detective is pushed to the brink of his moral and physical limits as he tangles with a ferociously skilled hired killer who specializes in torture and pain.

Title: The Shipping News
Description: An emotionally beaten man with his young daughter moves to his ancestral home in Newfoundland to reclaim his life.

Title: The Stanford Prison Experiment
Description: In 1971, twenty-four male students are selected to take on randomly assigned roles of prisoners and guards in a mock prison situated in the basement of the Stanford psychology building.

Title: The Four Feathers
Description: A British officer resigns his post just before battle and subsequently receives four white feathers from his friends and fiancee as symbols of what they believe to be his cowardice.

Title: The Innkeepers
Description: During the final days at the Yankee Pedlar Inn, two employees determined to reveal the hotel's haunted past begin to experience disturbing events as old guests check in for a stay.

Title: Pusher
Description: A drug pusher grows increasingly desperate after a botched deal leaves him with a large debt to a ruthless drug lord.

Title: Child's Play 3
Description: Chucky returns for revenge against Andy, the young boy who defeated him, and now a teenager living in a military academy.

Title: McFarland
Description: Jim White moves his family after losing his last job as a football coach. He sees that some of the students are worth starting a cross-country team and turns seven students with no hope into one of the best cross-country teams.

Title: The Cooler
Description: In an old school Las Vegas casino, its top gambling jinx breaks his curse when he falls in love, much to his boss' consternation.

Title: The Haunting
Description: A scientist doing research on the paranormal invites two women to a haunted mansion. One of the participants soon starts losing her mind.

Title: Father of the Bride Part II
Description: George Banks must deal not only with the pregnancy of his daughter, but also with the unexpected pregnancy of his wife.

Title: Giant
Description: Sprawling epic covering the life of a Texas cattle rancher and his family and associates.

Title: Rubber
Description: A homicidal car tire, discovering it has destructive psionic power, sets its sights on a desert town once a mysterious woman becomes its obsession.

Title: La Grande Illusion
Description: During the First World War, two French soldiers are captured and imprisoned in a German P.O.W. camp. Several escape attempts follow until they are sent to a seemingly impenetrable fortress which seems impossible to escape from.

Title: The Missing
Description: In 1885 New Mexico, a frontier medicine woman forms an uneasy alliance with her estranged father when her daughter is kidnapped by an Apache brujo.

Title: Flatliners
Description: Five medical students, obsessed by what lies beyond the confines of life, embark on a daring experiment: by stopping their hearts for short periods, each triggers a near-death experience - giving them a firsthand account of the afterlife.

Title: Annie
Description: A foster kid, who lives with her mean foster mom, sees her life change when business tycoon and New York City mayoral candidate Will Stacks makes a thinly-veiled campaign move and takes her in.

Title: Oliver!
Description: After being sold to a mortician, young orphan Oliver Twist runs away and meets a group of boys trained to be pickpockets by an elderly mentor.

Title: Bitter Moon
Description: After hearing stories of her, a passenger on a cruise ship develops an irresistible infatuation with an eccentric paraplegic's wife.

Title: Fighting
Description: In New York City, a young counterfeiter is introduced to the world of underground street fighting by a seasoned scam artist, who becomes his manager on the bare-knuckling brawling circuit.

Title: The Marine
Description: A group of diamond thieves on the run kidnap the wife of a recently discharged marine who goes on a chase through the South Carolinian wilderness to retrieve her.

Title: Choke
Description: A sex-addicted con-man pays for his mother's hospital bills by playing on the sympathies of those who rescue him from choking to death.

Title: May
Description: A lonely young woman traumatized by a difficult childhood and her increasingly desperate attempts to connect with the people around her is sent into a murderous tailspin.

Title: Shutter
Description: A newly married couple discovers disturbing, ghostly images in photographs they develop after a tragic accident. Fearing the manifestations may be connected, they investigate and learn that some mysteries are better left unsolved.

Title: Get Carter
Description: A Las Vegas mob enforcer, travels back to his hometown to investigate his brothers' mysterious death.

Title: Sweet and Lowdown
Description: In the 1930s, jazz guitarist Emmet Ray idolizes Django Reinhardt, faces gangsters and falls in love with a mute woman.

Title: Straw Dogs
Description: Los Angeles screenwriter David Sumner relocates with his wife to her hometown in the deep South. There, while tensions build between them, a brewing conflict with locals becomes a threat to them both.

Title: Welcome to the Punch
Description: When a notorious criminal is forced to return to London, it gives a detective one last chance to take down the man he's always been after.

Title: Agent Cody Banks
Description: A government agent trains Cody Banks in the ways of covert operations that require younger participants.

Title: Sherlock Jr.
Description: A film projectionist longs to be a detective, and puts his meagre skills to work when he is framed by a rival for stealing his girlfriend's father's pocketwatch.

Title: Black
Description: The cathartic tale of a young woman who can't see, hear or talk and the teacher who brings a ray of light into her dark world.

Title: The One I Love
Description: A troubled couple vacate to a beautiful getaway, but bizarre circumstances further complicate their situation.

Title: Bedknobs and Broomsticks
Description: An apprentice witch, three kids and a cynical magician conman search for the missing component to a magic spell to be used in the defense of Britain in WWII.

Title: The Phantom
Description: The Phantom, descendent of a line of African superheroes, travels to New York City to thwart a wealthy criminal genius from obtaining three magic skulls which would give him the secret to ultimate power.

Title: Shortbus
Description: A group of New Yorkers caught up in their romantic-sexual milieu converge at an underground salon infamous for its blend of art, music, politics, and carnality.

Title: Throw Momma from the Train
Description: A bitter ex-husband wants his former spouse dead. A put-upon momma's boy wants his mother dead. Who will pull it off?

Title: Mujeres al borde de un ataque de "nervios"
Description: A television actress encounters a variety of eccentric characters after embarking on a journey to discover why her lover abruptly left her.

Title: Fools Rush In
Description: After a one night stand with Alex, Isabel realizes that she is pregnant and they decide to get married. However, along with the marriage comes compromise of one's own cultural traditions.

Title: Dear Zindagi
Description: Kaira is a budding cinematographer in search of a perfect life. Her encounter with Jug, an unconventional thinker, helps her gain a new perspective on life. She discovers that happiness is all about finding comfort in life's imperfections.

Title: The Woodsman
Description: A child molester returns to his hometown after 12 years in prison and attempts to start a new life.

Title: Chaos Theory
Description: The story of an obsessively organized efficiency expert whose life unravels in unexpected ways when fate forces him to explore the serendipitous nature of love and forgiveness.

Title: Man of the Year
Description: A comedian who hosts a news satire program decides to run for president, and a computerized voting machine malfunction gets him elected.

Title: Joheunnom nabbeunnom isanghannom
Description: The story of two outlaws and a bounty hunter in 1940s Manchuria and their rivalry to possess a treasure map while being pursued by the Japanese army and Chinese bandits.

Title: Deep Rising
Description: A group of heavily armed hijackers board a luxury ocean liner in the South Pacific Ocean to loot it, only to do battle with a series of large-sized, tentacled, man-eating sea creatures who had already invaded the ship.

Title: Flypaper
Description: A man caught in the middle of two simultaneous robberies at the same bank desperately tries to protect the teller with whom he's secretly in love.

Title: [Rec]³: Génesis
Description: A couple's wedding day turns horrific as some of the guests start showing signs of a strange illness.
The famous 1970s New York City nightclub seen and told through the eyes of a young employee.

Title: The Seven Year Itch
Description: When his family goes away for the summer, a so far faithful husband is tempted by a beautiful neighbor.

Title: Stranger Than Paradise
Description: A New Yorker's life is thrown into a tailspin when his younger cousin surprise visits him, starting a strange, unpredictable adventure.

Title: La montaña sagrada
Description: In a corrupt, greed-fueled world, a powerful alchemist leads a Christ-like character and seven materialistic figures to the Holy Mountain, where they hope to achieve enlightenment.

Title: Instinct
Description: When a noted anthropologist who left society to live in the jungle is imprisoned for murder, it's up to a young psychiatrist to get through to him.

Title: Dracula 2001
Description: A group of thieves breaks into a chamber expecting to find paintings, but instead they release the count himself, who travels to New Orleans to find his nemesis' daughter, Mary Van Helsing.

Title: Little Big Man
Description: Jack Crabb, looking back from extreme old age, tells of his life being raised by Native Americans and fighting with General Custer.

Title: Antwone Fisher
Description: Antwone Fisher, a young navy man, is forced to see a psychiatrist after a violent outburst against a fellow crewman. During the course of treatment a painful past is revealed and a new hope begins.

Title: In the Land of Women
Description: A sleazy writer has a chance to redeem himself when he goes to stay with his grandmother and befriends the neighbors.

Title: Grease 2
Description: An English student at a 1960s American high school has to prove himself to the leader of a girls' gang whose members can only date greasers.

Title: Peggy Sue Got Married
Description: Peggy Sue faints at a high school reunion. When she wakes up, she finds herself in her own past, just before she finished school.

Title: Exit Wounds
Description: Orin Boyd, a tough cop in an inner-city precinct discovers a web of dirty cops and corruption.

Title: Il Postino: The Postman
Description: Simple Italian postman learns to love poetry while delivering mail to a famous poet; he uses this to woo local beauty Beatrice.

Title: Dungeons & Dragons
Description: Profion, a tyrant, attempts to overthrow a peaceful kingdom ruled by a tough empress.

Title: The Way of the Gun
Description: Two criminal drifters without sympathy get more than they bargained for after kidnapping and holding for ransom the surrogate mother of a powerful and shady man.

Title: 24 Hour Party People

Title: Hard Rain
Description: A armored-truck driver and his nephew try to prevent three million dollars from being taken by a local rival gang during a catastrophic flooding caused by a severe storm.

Title: The Cannonball Run
Description: A wide variety of eccentric competitors participate in a wild and illegal cross-country road race. However, the eccentric entrants will do anything to win the road race, including low-down, dirty tricks.

Title: The Witches
Description: A young boy stumbles onto a witch convention and must stop them, even after he has been turned into a mouse.

Title: Paul Blart: Mall Cop 2
Description: After six years of keeping our malls safe, Paul Blart has earned a well-deserved vacation. He heads to Las Vegas with his teenage daughter before she heads off to college. But safety never takes a holiday and when duty calls, Blart answers.

Title: This Must Be the Place
Description: Cheyenne, a retired rock star living off his royalties in Dublin, returns to New York City to find the man responsible for a humiliation suffered by his recently deceased father during W.W.II.

Title: Step Up All In
Description: All-stars from the previous Step Up installments come together in glittering Las Vegas, battling for a victory that could define their dreams and their careers.

Title: The House
Description: After the town takes away their daughter's college scholarship, a couple start an illegal casino in their friend's house to make back the money.

Title: Where the Heart Is
Description: A pregnant 17-year-old rebuilds her life after being abandoned by her boyfriend at a Wal-Mart in Sequoyah, Oklahoma.

Title: Forces of Nature
Description: A soon-to-be-married man encounters an exciting stranger after his plane suffers an accident on takeoff.

Title: Doc Hollywood
Description: A young doctor causes a traffic accident in a small town and is sentenced to work for some days at the town hospital.

Title: Repo Man
Description: Young punk Otto becomes a repo man after helping to steal a car, and stumbles into a world of wackiness as a result.

Title: Leatherheads
Description: In 1925, an enterprising pro football player convinces America's too-good-to-be-true college football hero to play for his team and keep the league from going under.

Title: Mesrine Part 1: Killer Instinct
Description: The story of french gangster Jacques Mesrine, before he was called Public Enemy N°1.

Title: The Sweet Hereafter
Description: A bus crash in a small town brings a lawyer to the town to defend the families, but he discovers that everything is not what it seems.

Title: Astro Boy
Description: When an android replica of a boy is rejected by his aggrieved creator, he goes off to find his own identity in an adventure that would make him the greatest hero of his time.

Title: The Lost Weekend
Description: The desperate life of a chronic alcoholic is followed through a four-day drinking bout.

Title: Tideland
Description: Because of the actions of her irresponsible parents, a young girl is left alone on a decrepit country estate and survives inside her fantastic imagination.

Title: Drop Dead Gorgeous
Description: A small-town beauty pageant turns deadly as it becomes clear that someone will go to any lengths to win.

Title: Arthur et les Minimoys
Description: Ten-year-old Arthur, in a bid to save his grandfather's house from being demolished, goes looking for some much-fabled hidden treasure in the land of the Minimoys, tiny people living in harmony with nature.

Title: 20th Century Women
Description: The story of a teenage boy, his mother, and two other women who help raise him among the love and freedom of Southern California of 1979.

Title: Melinda and Melinda
Description: Two alternating stories, one comedy and the other tragedy, about Melinda's attempts to straighten out her life.

Title: Twilight Zone: The Movie
Description: Four horror and science fiction segments, directed by four famous directors, each of them being a new version of a classic story from Rod Serling's landmark television series.

Title: Welcome to the Dollhouse
Description: An unattractive seventh grader struggles to cope with inattentive parents, snobbish classmates, a smart older brother, an attractive younger sister and her own insecurities in suburban New Jersey.

Title: Race
Description: Jesse Owens' quest to become the greatest track and field athlete in history thrusts him onto the world stage of the 1936 Olympics, where he faces off against Adolf Hitler's vision of Aryan supremacy.

Title: Angel-A
Description: A beautiful woman helps an inept scam artist get his game together.

Title: Picnic at Hanging Rock
Description: During a rural summer picnic, a few students and a teacher from an Australian girls' school vanish without a trace. Their absence frustrates and haunts the people left behind.

Title: The Red Violin
Description: A perfect red-colored violin inspires passion, making its way through three centuries over several owners and countries, eventually ending up at an auction where it may find a new owner.

Title: Jersey Boys
Description: The story of four young men from the wrong side of the tracks in New Jersey who came together to form the iconic 1960s rock group The Four Seasons.

Title: The Commitments
Description: When Jimmy Rabbitte wants to start a band, he has open auditions at his house.

Title: The Rookie
Description: A Texas baseball coach makes the major league after agreeing to try out if his high school team made the playoffs.

Title: Dressed to Kill
Description: A mysterious blonde woman kills one of a psychiatrist's patients, and then goes after the high-class call girl who witnessed the murder.

Title: The Edukators
Description: Three activists cobble together a kidnapping plot after they encounter a businessman in his home.

Title: Police Academy 5: Assignment: Miami Beach
Description: The old Commandant Lassard, leader of the Police Academy (1984), goes to Florida to receive an award. In the city arrives also the cynic Captain Harris who wants to take Lassard's job. ...                See full summary »

Title: Coriolanus
Description: A banished hero of Rome allies with a sworn enemy to take his revenge on the city.

Title: Son of Rambow
Description: During a long English summer in the early 1980s, two schoolboys from differing backgrounds set out to make a film inspired by First Blood (1982).

Title: Beautiful Girls
Description: A piano player at a crossroads in his life returns home to his friends and their own problems with life and love.

Title: Halloween 5
Description: One year after the events of Halloween 4: The Return of Michael Myers (1988), the Shape returns to Haddonfield once again in an attempt to kill his now-mute niece.

Title: The Skulls
Description: Luke McNamara, a college senior from a working class background joins a secret elitist college fraternity organization called "The Skulls", in hope of gaining acceptance into Harvard Law ...                See full summary »

Title: The Big Chill
Description: A group of seven former college friends gather for a weekend reunion at a South Carolina winter house after the funeral of one of their friends.

Title: Mustang
Description: When five orphan girls are seen innocently playing with boys on a beach, their scandalized conservative guardians confine them while forced marriages are arranged.

Title: Near Dark
Description: A small-town farmer's son reluctantly joins a traveling group of vampires after he is bitten by a beautiful drifter.

Title: The Final Cut
Description: Set in a world with memory recording implants, Alan Hakman is a cutter, someone with the power of final edit over people's recorded histories. His latest assignment is one that puts him in danger.

Title: The Company You Keep
Description: A former Weather Underground activist goes on the run from a journalist who has discovered his identity.

Title: Sudden Death
Description: A former fireman takes on a group of terrorists holding the Vice President and others hostage during the seventh game of the NHL Stanley Cup finals.

Title: American Honey
Description: A teenage girl with nothing to lose joins a traveling magazine sales crew, and gets caught up in a whirlwind of hard partying, law bending and young love as she criss-crosses the Midwest with a band of misfits.

Title: One Missed Call
Description: Several people start receiving voice-mails from their future selves - messages which include the date, time, and some of the details of their deaths.

Title: Pathology
Description: A group of medical students devise a deadly game: to see which one of them can commit the perfect murder.

Title: English Vinglish
Description: A quiet, sweet tempered housewife endures small slights from her well-educated husband and daughter every day because of her inability to speak and understand English.

Title: Looney Tunes: Back in Action
Description: The Looney Tunes search for a man's missing father and the mythical Blue Monkey diamond.

Title: The Whistleblower
Description: A drama based on the experiences of Kathryn Bolkovac, a Nebraska cop who served as a peacekeeper in post-war Bosnia and outed the U.N. for covering up a sex trafficking scandal.

Title: Bastille Day
Description: A young pickpocket and an unruly CIA agent team up on an anti-terrorist mission in France.

Title: City Island
Description: The Rizzos, a family who doesn't share their habits, aspirations, and careers with one another, find their delicate web of lies disturbed by the arrival of a young ex-con (Strait) brought ...                See full summary »

Title: Sin Nombre
Description: A Honduran young girl and a Mexican gangster are united in a journey across the American border.

Title: The Arrival
Description: Zane, an astronomer, discovers intelligent alien life. But the aliens are keeping a deadly secret, and will do anything to stop Zane from learning it.

Title: A.W.O.L.: Absent Without Leave
Description: An Ex-French Soldier begins participating in underground street fights in order to make money for his brother's family.

Title: Stronger
Description: Stronger is the inspiring real life story of Jeff Bauman, an ordinary man who captured the hearts of his city and the world to become a symbol of hope after surviving the 2013 Boston Marathon bombing.

Title: P2
Description: A businesswoman is pursued by a psychopath after being locked in a parking garage on Christmas Eve.

Title: The Last House on the Left
Description: Two teenage girls head to a rock concert for one's birthday. While trying to score marijuana in the city, they are kidnapped and brutalized by a gang of psychotic convicts.

Title: In a World...
Description: An underachieving voice coach finds herself competing in the movie trailer voice-over profession against her arrogant father and his protégé.

Description: A young man who was born without an immune system and has lived his life within a plastic bubble in his bedroom finds out that the woman he has loved since childhood is about to be married ...                See full summary »
